properties.entry: SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC ) WHERE FUNDING <= 50

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC ) WHERE FUNDING BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC ) WHERE FUNDING >= 100

SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING <= 50

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING >= 100

SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 AND PJ_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY PROJECT_START , PROJECT_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 AND PJ_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING <= 50

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 AND PJ_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , ATTACHMENT_PATH || ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" , PROJECT_END FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT ON (PROJECT_NO = ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1 AND PJ_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY FUNDING DESC ) WHERE FUNDING >= 100

SELECT PROJECT_NO , PROJECT_SELLER , PROJECT_OVERVIEW , PROJECT_TITLE , PROJECT_CONTENT , PROJECT_TAG , PROJECT_PRICE , PROJECT_START , PROJECT_END , PROJECT_PAYMENT_BUYER , PROJECT_PAYMENT_SELLER , PJ_CATEGORY_NO , PJ_CATEGORY_NAME , SELLER_FUNDING , TRUNC(SELLER_FUNDING / PROJECT_PRICE * 100) "FUNDING" FROM TB_PROJECT JOIN TB_PJ_CATEGORY ON (PROJECT_CATEGORY_NO = PJ_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_SELLER ON (PROJECT_NO = SELLER_PROJECT_NO) WHERE PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND PROJECT_NO = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_NO , ATTACHMENT_UPDATE_NAME , ATTACHMENT_PATH FROM TB_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_PROJECT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_BUYER WHERE BUYER_PROJECT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_LIKES WHERE LIKES_PROJECT_NO = ?
SELECT PJ_CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_PJ_CATEGORY WHERE PJ_CATEGORY_NAME = ?
